This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

1. NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS
   ====================
2. SEE WHAT’S HAPPENING

### [News Flash](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1)

1. [![Plant](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3230)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)

   #### [Alerts & Notifications](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)

   Access various alerts including road closures, parking alerts, boil water advisories, and more. Alerts will be displayed at the top of the website when active. Visitors can also sign up to receive notifications on specific categories to always stay... [Read on... about Alerts & Notifications](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)
2. [![West Lake](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3234)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)

   #### [Stay Connected](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)

   Notify Me allows you to subscribe to an unlimited number of email lists. Receive email or text message updates regarding the information you have requested. [Read on... about Stay Connected](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)
3. [![squirrel2.shutterstock_2186788855](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3380)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)

   #### [Report a Concern](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)

   Use Citizen Request Tracker to notify us about a general concern, comment, or compliment. Visitors can also log in to check on the progress of existing requests. [Read on... about Report a Concern](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)
4. [![Waste Disposal Services Delayed Opens in new window](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4512)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=475)

   #### [Trash Service Delays](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=475)

   Update on Trash Service: TDS has asked customers to leave their carts out this week until they are able to be serviced. Due to varying ice accumulation, TDS will service carts as they are able to navigate the routes. Thank you for your patience.
5. [![Offices Closed Opens in new window](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3008)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)

   #### [City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)

   Due to inclement weather and hazardous travel conditions, City Hall and Police administrative offices will be closed Tuesday, January 27, 2026. [Read on... about City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)
6. [![Wildfire Season Opens in new window](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4222)](https://www.westlakehills.gov/401/FIREWISE)

   #### [Firewise - Fire Safety and Wildfire Preparedness](https://www.westlakehills.gov/401/FIREWISE)

   [Additional Info... about Firewise - Fire Safety and Wildfire Preparedness](https://www.westlakehills.gov/401/FIREWISE)
7. [![CDBG survey Opens in new window](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4515)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=456)

   #### [Travis County CDBG Community Needs Survey for 2026](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=456)

   The Travis County Health & Human Services CDBG Team is asking for your input about community needs for low- and moderate-income families, persons with disabilities, seniors, and youth who live in West Lake Hills. Read on for links to the CDBG survey. [Read on... about Travis County CDBG Community Needs Survey for 2026](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=456)
8. [![Loop 360 Opens in new window](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=360)

   #### [Loop 360 Project Updates](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=360)

   Work continues to stabilize the west cliffs before construction begins on the Loop 360 at Courtyard Drive/RM 222 project this summer. Read on for more info. [Read on... about Loop 360 Project Updates](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=360)
9. [![iStock-521989614-Police Opens in new window](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://westlakehills.gov/240/Application-and-Positions)

   #### [Employment Opportunities - WLH Police Department](https://westlakehills.gov/240/Application-and-Positions)

   The West Lake Hills Police Department is looking for YOU to join our team! We have multiple openings for Police Officers and will be accepting applications until the positions are filled. We believe in policing that responds to the needs of the community. [Click here to apply about Employment Opportunities - WLH Police Department](https://westlakehills.gov/240/Application-and-Positions)
10. [![Plant](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)

    #### [Alerts & Notifications](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)

    Access various alerts including road closures, parking alerts, boil water advisories, and more. Alerts will be displayed at the top of the website when active. Visitors can also sign up to receive notifications on specific categories to always stay... [Read on... about Alerts & Notifications](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=434)
11. [![West Lake](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)

    #### [Stay Connected](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)

    Notify Me allows you to subscribe to an unlimited number of email lists. Receive email or text message updates regarding the information you have requested. [Read on... about Stay Connected](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=436)
12. [![squirrel2.shutterstock_2186788855](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)

    #### [Report a Concern](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)

    Use Citizen Request Tracker to notify us about a general concern, comment, or compliment. Visitors can also log in to check on the progress of existing requests. [Read on... about Report a Concern](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=437)
13. [![Waste Disposal Services Delayed Opens in new window](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4512)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=475)

    #### [Trash Service Delays](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=475)

    Update on Trash Service: TDS has asked customers to leave their carts out this week until they are able to be serviced. Due to varying ice accumulation, TDS will service carts as they are able to navigate the routes. Thank you for your patience.
14. [![Offices Closed Opens in new window](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)

    #### [City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)

    Due to inclement weather and hazardous travel conditions, City Hall and Police administrative offices will be closed Tuesday, January 27, 2026. [Read on... about City Hall and Police Administrative Offices Closed Due to Weather](https://www.westlakehills.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=352)

1. FACTS & NUMBERS
   ===============
2. WEST LAKE HILLS INFORMATION

1. ![Founded](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3239)

   ### Founded

   1953

1. ![Population](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3241)

   ### Population

   3,444

1. ![Median Age](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3240)

   ### Median Age

   50.7

1. ![County](https://www.westlakehills.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3238)

   ### County

   Travis
